content: If you are unnoticed by a creature, that creature has no idea you are present at all. When you're unnoticed, you're also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by the creature. This condition matters for abilities that can be used only against targets totally unaware of your presence.
name: Unnoticed
